name: GlowStick Beta
description:
This is the story of Dotey, an adventurous idiot that didn't listen to his mom.

click "Play", and kill those guys using arrow keys, and press space to shing sword.

after 30 kills, you can access the map editor, where you can make extremely low-quality maps!

(or just press "f")  

made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2
